documents.document: @AnnWaddell15 @Gorgieboys51 Spread the word! See you at 7pm!

I’ve been lucky enough to interview some big stars (and some crap ones) but I literally cannot wait for this! ❤️⚽️🎤 Our new series is getting up and running in style! Watch it live on the @JamTarts official Facebook from 7pm tomorrow night. 🎥 https://t.co/DBsE8TuEnL

@linzi81 @JamTarts @jamb0skickback Hi Linzi, this is a new family event which we were determined to make free. The tickets were in high demand as you can imagine. Keep an eye out on how you can still see the night itself...👌

Thanks for the Steven Naismith question suggestions for our 'An Evening With...' on Friday. There's some really good (and sensible) suggestions so thank you! Keep an eye out on @JamTarts for more about the night and how you can see it... 😉 https://t.co/pBPYdS9494

Whoever called me at 5am from a withheld number, I was sleeping! Thanks for calling! 🤣🤣🤣
@Kev32626177 I’m Scott’s deputy when he’s off. How come?
@stuartmoodie9 @SarahBanyard 🤣🤣🤣
@stuartmoodie9 @SarahBanyard 😂😂😂 It did make me chuckle! ‘He wants what!?’ ‘He definitely said boiling water... I think....’😆😆😆
@jk1874 @JamTarts @OllyLee7 @UcheIkpeazu She’s welcome back any time! Thanks for joining us, it was a lovely day!😍
@jk1874 @JamTarts @OllyLee7 @UcheIkpeazu Look at Tess’ face in those pictures! I’m really glad she enjoyed her day! She was our lucky mascot!❤️😂😍
RT @jk1874: Amazing day for Tess watching the league leaders @JamTarts meeting @OllyLee7 @UcheIkpeazu @immarkmartin a real shame she’s miss…
@stuartmoodie9 No worries mate! That one time @SarahBanyard thought I was joking about the boiling water she had to check! 😂😂😂 Look after that littleun, she’s such a wee cutie and already a Jambo! ❤️
A very rewarding day at the office both on and off the pitch!❤️❤️❤️ https://t.co/7vtH5K7VZ5

It was really nice to be back at @edinburghcoll today dishing out @jamtarts prizes! It's been a brilliant month here at Tynecastle Park welcoming new students from Edinburgh and beyond! ⚽️⚽️⚽️ #monthehearts #hearts #hmfc #students https://t.co/EXnsSVfG2q
@masonh52 Planning is ongoing mate. Lets see what happens.
Happy #fifa19 day! This will be me and @craiggoodyear this weekend with me in a huff no doubt! #fifarage 😂😂😂 https://t.co/Jsxznb0pOx

It’s been 3 years to the day since we lost this local landmark. I still look down the coast every so often (out of habit) to try and spot it from Seafield Road! 😂😂😂#cockenzie https://t.co/BhIS5HqyPG

What a start to the week here at @JamTarts 😍 We've still got LED advertising and sponsorship options available for upcoming matches if you fancy signing for Hearts this season? Drop me an email: markmartin@homplc.co.uk ⚽️ #monthehearts #hearts #SPFL #tynecastlepark https://t.co/4x1LbY6DXm
